Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY FOR THE PARISH OF AVOYELLES TO COLLECT A $35 ANNUAL SERVICE CHARGE FROM PERSONS OWNING EACH RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL STRUCTURE FOR A PERIOD OF 10 YEARS FOR THE ABATEMENT, CONTROL AND ERADICATION OF MOSQUITOES AND OTHER ARTHROPODS OF PUBLIC HEALTH IMPORTANCE, INCLUDING THE ACQUISITION, MAINTENANCE, OPERATION AND SUPPORT OF EQUIPMENT, FACILITIES, SUPPLIES AND SERVICES THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect an annual service charge of Thirty-Five Dollars ($35.00) from persons owning each residential or commercial structure, whether such structures are occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, to be used for the costs of any or all services provided by the Parish for the abatement, control and eradication of mosquitoes and other arthropods of public health importance, including the acquisition, maintenance, operation and support of equipment, facilities, supplies and services therefor, and, for purposes of assessing and collecting said service charge, owners shall be assessed a service charge for each such structure which they own, and each residential or commercial unit and each housing unit within a multiple dwelling structure shall be considered a separate structure, and a mobile home, as defined in R.S. 9:1149.2(3), shall be considered a structure, all as provided by Act 700 of the 2006 Regular Session of the Louisiana Legislature?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Simmesport -- Appoint Marshal - Mayor & BOA
Race.SummaryText:
TOWN OF SIMMESPORT PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY FOR THE MAYOR TO APPOINT A MARSHAL WHO IS CHIEF OF POLICE FOR THE TOWN OF SIMMESPORT WITH THE APPROVAL OF THE SIMMESPORT BOARD OF ALDERMEN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Mayor of the Town of Simmesport, with the approval of the Simmesport Board of Aldermen, be authorized to appoint a marshal who is the Chief of Police for the Town of Simmesport?
